name: Telegram Torrent Leecher
description: A Telegram Torrent (and youtube-dl) Leecher based on Pyrogram

AUTHORIZED_CHATS.description: should be an integer. The BOT API ID of the Telegram Group, where the Leecher should work.

OWNER_ID.description: should be an integer. ID of owner of bot

INDEX_URL.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

DOWNLOAD_DIR.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

AUTO_DELETE_MESSAGE_DURATION.description: Enter your custom gleech command like /gleech1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /gleech

IS_TEAM_DRIVE.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

USE_SERVICE_ACCOUNTS.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

MEGA_API_KEY.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

MEGA_EMAIL_ID.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

MEGA_PASSWORD.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

BUTTON_THREE_NAME.description: Enter your custom gleech command like /gleech1@urgroupname and so on. Default is /gleech

BUTTON_THREE_URL.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

BUTTON_FOUR_NAME.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

BUTTON_FOUR_URL.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

BUTTON_FIVE_NAME.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

BUTTON_FIVE_URL.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

STOP_DUPLICATE_MIRROR.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

BLOCK_MEGA_LINKS.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

SHORTENER.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech

SHORTENER_API.description: Enter your custom leech command like /leech@urgroupname and so on. Default is /leech
